Text:

Cheers for Californication.. No Breakout Kings anymore?
Cheers for Californication... No Breakout Kings anymore?
u did shameless!, u told me few weeks ago that u wont be doing shameless, if u r doing shameless kindly post all 9 episodes tooo

:D

@abobill & @Dr-nido: Last week Dr-nidO said "sorry, I broke the rule without knowing".

In same text, as I pointed to back then, is clearly written:

"Do NOT request inclusion of TV shows in my schedule; that's my call. The removal of some show depends on many factors, however, be sure that shows would be dropped if I spot lack of interest, hungry hard-fisting crowd or too high a number of Hit and Runs. These decisions are my own."

Fuck... I post that text every day, even more than once - and like gazillion times altogether.
thanks for the transformers.i used to watch it wen was a kid and i still like it
Appreciate your efforts! Thank you for: Californication, Outcasts, Shameless (I'd been downloading 720p), Simpsons, and Transformers. [+1]

@ 2040

first of all know that i really appreciate your dedication and the amount of time you must put in your work,its wonderful to get almost all of the shows on daily basis in great quality...
your exemption for house was wonderful.. 

my previous comment was just a sad exclamation that you dropped a show you were previously doing

it does not mean that i don't appreciate getting
all the rest, every day :-)

I am really sorry if i came across as an ungrateful git...

keep up the great work and as alyawys +1

@ 2040

first of all know that i really appreciate your dedication and the amount of time you must put in your work. and the exemption for house was really great of you...

that said my previous comment
"no Breakout kings anymore :-("
was just a SAD exclamation on my part to not see a promising show that you were doing before.

it does not take away the fact that i love getting latest episodes of AALLLLl the other shows, every day , in GREAT quality :-)

I am really sorry if i came across as an ungrateful git ...

keep up the great work and +1 as always

Thx for the Californication n Being Human.

Hi 20-40,
